b036a6ac-6cff-4066-92bc-74ddfd9ad6fa.description: This is a software component that implements basic authentication mechanisms.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the SP 800-53 rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement AC-2 (2).

implemented-requirements.description: Inactive accounts are automatically disabled based on the duration specified by the duration parameter. Disabled accounts are expected to be reviewed and removed when appropriate.
